original_text: Neither of the men had enough money to pay him back. Then the man that had lent them the money forgave them. “You do not need to pay back my money,” he said to them both.’
korean_text: 갚을 것이 없으므로 둘 다 탕감하여 주었으니 둘 중에 누가 그를 더 사랑하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Neither of the men had enough money
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람 중 어느 누구도 충분한 돈이 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then the man that had lent them the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그들에게 돈을 빌려준 그 사람이

sentences.original_text: You do not need to pay back my money
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내 돈을 갚을 필요가 없다
